item.title: By: jack.oxton
item.dc:creator: jack.oxton
item.description: Amazing. Raspberry is one of my favorite flavors, but has a tendency to be completely overpowering or get completely lost in other flavors. Very well balanced, with a strong peach and honeysuckle onset, followed by a scintillating lemon-lime and raspberry finish. Refreshing and delicious at the same time!
item.content:encoded: Amazing. Raspberry is one of my favorite flavors, but has a tendency to be completely overpowering or get completely lost in other flavors. Very well balanced, with a strong peach and honeysuckle onset, followed by a scintillating lemon-lime and raspberry finish. Refreshing and delicious at the same time!
